statements: SELECT * FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, brand, color FROM sports_equipment WHERE sport_type = 'Basketball';
SELECT equipment_name, material FROM sports_equipment WHERE brand = 'Nike';
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE material = 'Leather' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, sport_type, color FROM sports_equipment WHERE color LIKE '%blue%' AND brand IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE brand='Nike' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, sport_type, color FROM sports_equipment WHERE material='Plastic';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, brand FROM sports_equipment WHERE sport_type='Football' AND color='Black' ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, brand, material FROM sports_equipment WHERE color='Blue' AND brand='Adidas';
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE sport_type='Tennis' ORDER BY color ASC, brand DESC;
SELECT * FROM 3d_models;
SELECT model_id, model_name, brand, price FROM 3d_models WHERE brand='XYZ';
SELECT model_name, category, description FROM 3d_models WHERE price > 500.00;
SELECT model_id, model_name, category FROM 3d_models ORDER BY category ASC, model_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM 3d_models WHERE category='Electronics' AND brand='ABC' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, price FROM 3d_models WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM 3d_models WHERE brand = 'XYZ Corporation' AND price > 1000;
SELECT model_name, brand, price, description FROM 3d_models WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT model_name, category, price FROM 3d_models WHERE brand LIKE 'ABC%' AND category IN ('Fashion', 'Art');
SELECT model_name, brand, category, price, description FROM 3d_models WHERE model_id IN (SELECT model_id FROM customization_options WHERE option_type = 'Color' AND option_value = 'Red');
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, model FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Football';
SELECT brand, model, color FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY brand ASC, color DESC;
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT equipment_type, brand, model FROM sports_equipment WHERE color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE brand='Nike';
SELECT equipment_type, brand FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY brand ASC, equipment_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT equipment_type, model, color FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_type='Shoes' AND model LIKE '%Air%' ORDER BY color;

SELECT c.customization_id, s.equipment_type, s.brand, o.option_name FROM customizations c JOIN sports_equipment s ON c.equipment_id = s.equipment_id JOIN customization_options o ON c.option_id = o.option_id ORDER BY s.brand, o.option_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, brand, size FROM sports_equipment WHERE color='Red'
SELECT id, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE brand='Nike' OR brand='Adidas'
SELECT * FROM gear_customization WHERE customization_option='Logo'
SELECT u.username, ue.name, ue.brand FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.id = up.user_id JOIN sports_equipment ue ON up.equipment_id = ue.id
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY brand DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, color, size FROM sports_equipment WHERE color = 'Blue' OR color = 'Red' ORDER BY size ASC

SELECT users.username, sports_equipment.name, gear_customization.customization_option FROM users INNER JOIN user_preferences ON users.id = user_preferences.user_id INNER JOIN sports_equipment ON user_preferences.equipment_id = sports_equipment.id INNER JOIN gear_customization ON sports_equipment.id = gear_customization.equipment_id WHERE gear_customization.customization_value = 'Waterproof'
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE brand LIKE '%Nike%' OR brand LIKE '%Adidas%' AND size = 'L'

SELECT users.username AS user, COUNT(user_preferences.equipment_id) AS total_preferences FROM users INNER JOIN user_preferences ON users.id = user_preferences.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_preferences > 3
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment
SELECT id, name, type, brand FROM sports_equipment
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE equipment_id = 2
SELECT id, option_name, color FROM customization_options WHERE material = 'Plastic'
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, uc.equipment_id, uc.customization_time FROM users u JOIN user_customizations uc ON u.id = uc.user_id
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, type, brand FROM sports_equipment WHERE price > 100;
SELECT u.name, u.age, s.start_time FROM users u JOIN sessions s ON u.id = s.user_id;
SELECT u.name, c.option_name FROM users u JOIN user_customizations uc ON u.id = uc.user_id JOIN customization_options c ON uc.option_id = c.id;
SELECT s.name, c.color, c.material FROM sports_equipment s JOIN customization_options c ON s.id = c.equipment_id WHERE c.color = 'Red';
